findings.description: Unchecked ERC20 return values (can redeem ETH without transferring tokens for non-reverting ERC20s)
findings.reasoning: The finding is related to the target vulnerability but does not correctly identify the root cause of the Bedrock DeFi exploit.

target_assessment.type_match_reasoning: The finding does not match the target vulnerability type of 'logic_error'.

notes: The audit findings did not identify the target vulnerability of the incorrect hardcoded 1:1 ETH:BTC exchange rate in the mint function. Instead, they identified a separate issue related to unchecked ERC20 return values.
